overview:
Our Chief Operating Officer, Maria Silvia, has extensive media-marketing experience including more than 7 years in the media market and more recently in the mobile to web2 space. She is a Marketing Communications Specialist for Brand, PR, Digital Media, Events and Communications (B2B, B2C & D2C)

As part of her career, She has also established and successfully managed her own Media & marketing consultancy. Prior to Visio2, she was Visual Executive at Inditex Group (IBEX-35:ITX) and after Chief or Production at AlbiÃ±ana Films & Producciones Barcelona.

She has managed the production of several Television advertisements, video-clips, Corporate Image, documentaries, TV & Web-content, Photo-Catalogues in many countries of Europe, South-America and Africa.

Maria Silvia studied Cinema and Visual Arts at University of Barcelona and Photographic Direction at Centre d’Estudis CinematogrÃ fics de Catalunya andLicenciatura en DirecciÃ³n de Cine y Video ,Escuela de Cine y Video (Argentina) 2003 .
